segments.text: Hi , Zina . I had a feeling you'd be stopping by .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look , Vince . I didn't mean to step on your toes , but we need to be decisive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know it . WebTracker is playing for keeps . They'll go for our jugular if we give them the chance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is awkward , I know . I know you're upset . But in two weeks you'll be thanking me .
segments.speaker: S2
